#summary Getting Oversight.


All downloads are listed [http://code.google.com/p/oversight/downloads/list here] 

==Latest Versions==

If you want the latest version use the [http://www.nmtinstaller.com/ Community Software Installer (CSI)] or the [http://code.google.com/p/nmt-mini-installer/ mini-installer] to download it for you. 

==Older Versions==

If you want a specific version then either:

1. Download the csi_oversight_VERSION.zip and use the [http://www.nmtinstaller.com/ CSI] Install From File option 

OR

2. Use the [http://code.google.com/p/nmt-mini-installer/ Mini-Installer] and select the required version.
